summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed individual to appear and testify in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906. Failure to comply is noted as contempt of court.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), for which this subpoena is issued to compel testimony.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued this subpoena on July 12, 2021.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands an unnamed individual to appear before the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The subpoena was issued and signed by United States Attorney Audrey Strauss, commanding an individual to appear in court on November 29, 2021.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 12, 2021, for an individual to testify in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The subpoena commands the individual's appearance on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906.
Failure to comply is stated to constitute contempt of court, subjecting the individual to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The subpoena is signed by United States Attorney Audrey Strauss for the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the Ghislaine Maxwell case as of mid-2021.
